name: How to hide figma (prototype mode) top bar ? #tips
description:
Sharing simple tips.

recently got asked by a friend how to sharing a prototype without getting bothered by Figma's proto topbar (while trying to click on the notification icon on top). on option - unchecked 'show figma UI'.


just learnt that : when you share something from the prototype mode on figma, the option you choose to display will attach to the link you shared.
